com.project.ardrone_android_geii

Class JoystickCommandManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.ardrone_android_geii.JoystickCommandManager

  • public class JoystickCommandManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the commands from the virtual Joysticks.

      • JoystickCommandManager

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateCMDJoy1

        public void GenerateCMDJoy1(double i,
                            double j)
        Generate the parameters roll and pitch in function of the position of the joystick 1 on the axis x and y.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the joystick on the x axis.
        j - Position of the joystick on the y axis.

      • GenerateCMDJoy2

        public void GenerateCMDJoy2(double i,
                            double j)
        Generate the parameters yaw and gaz in function of the position of the joystick 2 on the axis x and y.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the joystick on the x axis.
        j - Position of the joystick on the y axis.

      • GeneratePCMD

        public java.lang.String GeneratePCMD(java.lang.String s)
        Generate the command’s part containing the parameters roll pitch gaz and yaw as well as the boolean allowing the drone to move.
        Parameters:
        s - String s containing a 0 or a 1, 0 activates the hover and 1 activates the pilotage
        Returns:
        String containing the second part of the AT command. Example : ",1,roll,pitch,gaz,yaw".
